record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1924. Fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: T. Eck, G. B. Ravenscroft, G. Kernwein, D. M. Beck, A. S. Edler, J. P. Long, H. G. Frieda, F. C. Edler, and N. B. Johnson; third row: C. J. Brickman (captain) and F. F. Caruso; second row: G. W. Harvey, C. K. McNeil, A. J. Jones, R. B. MacFarlane, R. S. Atwood, and F. K. Gowdy; first row: H. P. Bourke and L. T. Beall.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
